content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

Do you run a small business – a café, a wellness clinic, or a mortgage company? Confetti Design can help you create a stunning website for your Brighton shop, store, or office. Whatever industry you’re in, whether you’re running a boutique law firm or an ecommerce store in your home-based office in Brighton, Confetti Design can help take your business to the next level!

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design services in Brighton

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564536871871{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

We will help you build your e-commerce website from ground up. Our retail and e-commerce experience is invaluable in helping your business be a success.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1563757674489{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

How to improve your website's conversion for your business in Brighton

Turning your website visitors into users (hence, “converting” them) for your business in Brighton by making them complete a certain action like registering, giving their email, starting a trial, or buying your product takes a couple of steps to achieve. Studies have been made regarding the behavior of website visitors and much have been acquired by other companies by using this knowledge.

[vc_column_text]

Confetti Design specialises in creating professional web design that will suit your Brighton businesses’ needs. Whether for an e-commerce website design, WordPress website design, or Shopify web development, our team of experienced website developer will help you achieve the conversions you are targeting by executing the designs and functionalities perfectly.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604136910{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564540218012{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Articulate your value proposition in the clearest way possible.

Articulate on what problems your product or service is trying to solve. What is the “value add” of your product or service in Brighton to your customers, that only you offer? That sets you apart from your competitors? Present your value proposition in your home page and it should be the first thing your visitors will see.

Not only that Confetti Design has numerous experiences in small business web design, but we also provide valuable feedback and guidance about how to use your website to your business’ advantage.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604143056{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564540243414{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Make the most vital elements within your visitor’s reach.

Design your navigation menu, sidebars, and footers strategically and ensure their visibility to the user. This should be done specially for pages that are generating sales or leads for your e-commerce business in Brighton. We can’t expect our visitors to go hunting on your website to get what they need—they will just simply leave your site after seconds of not seeing what they’re looking for.

Confetti Design understands what an e-commerce website design needs and will execute these designs to achieve the conversion you’re aiming for.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604148917{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564540299318{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Keep it simple.

Less is more. This is absolutely true when it comes to the website for your shop in Brighton. If your website has a lot of elements going on all at the same time, the tendency is your visitors will get overwhelmed and lose interest in what you’re trying to sell. They will just leave your website altogether.

Consider a clean, elegant design for your website with just a few color palettes throughout the pages. Making use of white space will also prevent your visitors to get too overwhelmed; instead, they will feel comfortable browsing through the website for your business.

The strategy of Confetti Design is centered towards making sure that your visitors will find your website, whether the desktop or mobile website design, appealing to the eyes. This will compel them to stay browsing to your site longer and increase your chances of getting that conversion for your business.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604156298{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/steps_04aaa.jpg?id=11317) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564540318687{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Make your call to actions highly visible.

CTAs or Call to Action buttons are extremely important for the success of your website conversions for your business in Brighton. That is why you should pay careful attention on where to place it and how it looks like. Ideally, your CTA should be situated strategically where users will be able to see it right away. Your CTA should also stand out and have a different color than the rest of the page, with text that is easy to read.

Confetti Design pays attention in beautifully designing your CTAs and ensure that they are in line with your overall web design for your e-commerce store.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563757654696{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563757689176{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564540427960{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Brighton, Gardenvale, Elwood , and nearby areas. Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are the small business web design testimonials from our valued clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563757640684{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
